BattleEffect_SetPropertyValue.Name: Salvo_InitEffectiveDamageAtShortRange
BattleEffect_SetPropertyValue.InterpreterFormula: Property(Owner, @ClassModuleWeapon, Damage) * (1 - Property(InitiatorTarget, @ClassShip, DefenseBonusAtShortRange) - Property(InitiatorTarget, @ClassShip, DefenseBonusOverall)) * (1 + Property(Owner, @ClassModuleWeapon, DamageBonusAtShortRange))
